title: Coarse Juniper Branches
content:
Coarse Juniper Branches are an Item passively gathered with the Woodcutter profession by lopping a juniper tree with Tree Loppers and a basket, requiring level 25 Woodcutter and 1 knowledge point. One set of branches is awarded for each hour spent gathering.

They can be purchased from Gwen's lumber store for US$0 (please fill in) or sold for US$0 (please fill in).
